keybinding.category.x_hp.name: X-HP
keybinding.key.x_hp.name: Settings
x_hp.menu.option.enabled.tip: Whether it is disabled, on means disabled, off means not disabled
x_hp.menu.option.ban.tip: List of creatures that need to be ignored
x_hp.menu.option.base_y.tip: The starting point position of the rendering, Y axis(Up and down direction) offset
x_hp.menu.option.text_see.tip: Text can be displayed through the display
x_hp.menu.option.TOP_LEFT.tip: The text is fixed in the upper-left corner
x_hp.menu.option.TOP_CENTER.tip: Text is fixed in the upper-middle position
x_hp.menu.option.TOP_RIGHT.tip: The text is pinned in the upper-right corner
x_hp.menu.option.LEFT.tip: The text is fixed on the left
x_hp.menu.option.CENTER.tip: The text is fixed in the middle
x_hp.menu.option.RIGHT.tip: The text is fixed on the right
x_hp.menu.option.BOTTOM_LEFT.tip: The text is fixed in the lower-left corner
x_hp.menu.option.BOTTOM_CENTER.tip: The text is fixed in the lower-middle position
x_hp.menu.option.BOTTOM_RIGHT.tip: The text is fixed in the lower-right corner
x_hp.menu.option.COVER.tip: Overlay the background image with a fill image when rendering, and the background image is fully rendered.
x_hp.menu.option.APPEND.tip: When rendering, use the background image to connect the fill image, for example: 40% fill image + 60% background image.
x_hp.menu.option.damage.from_head.tip: Damage is displayed from the head, default is from the waist.
x_hp.menu.option.damage.crit_color.tip: The color that appears when the current damage exceeds the creature's maximum health by percentage
x_hp.menu.option.tips.tip: A small hint that appears on HUD
x_hp.menu.option.tips.name: Name
x_hp.menu.option.tips.interval.tip: The display distance between two values
x_hp.menu.option.tips.y_dirt.tip: Whether the text is offset up, whether it is offset down, the default is centered position
x_hp.menu.option.COLOR.tip: Use simple color styles, it may not be displayed properly in shaders
x_hp.menu.option.ICON.tip: Use the health icon to show it
x_hp.menu.option.BAR.tip: Use the health bar to show it
x_hp.menu.option.IMAGE.back_file.tip: Background image name, only PNG format is supported, please place the image under the /resourcepacks folder, image file name like: xxxx.png. Special note: Only the first clicked file is valid.
x_hp.menu.option.IMAGE.fill_file.tip: Fill image name, only PNG format is supported, please place the image under the /resourcepacks folder, image file name like: xxxx.png. Special note: Only the first clicked file is valid.
x_hp.menu.option.IMAGE.draw_key.tip: How background and fill images are rendered
x_hp.menu.option.FENCE.tip: Use '|' character display, a kind of Name Tag Style.
